column2:
Heard 
learned  Counsel 
for 
the 
Petitioner 
and 
learned  State  Counsel

representing  the  respondent. 
The  petitioner  to  the  present  application  has  come

before 
this  Court  seeking  a  writ  of  certiorari  quashing 
a 
decision  of  the  3rd

respondent  granting 
the 
license  with 
regard 
to  a  State 
land 
to 
the  5th 
to  7th
respondents.  As  revealed  before  this  Court the two  petitioners  submitted that they
were in occupation of a  State land for  a  long period of time but made an application

to  regularize  the  said  land  only 
in  the  year  2015. 
In  support  of  his  position  he

submits  marked  A2  a  report  from 
the  Grama  Niladhari  of Hinguruwelpitiya  dated
